prompt: A chibi-style character in greyscale construction paper cut-out aesthetic, flat shapes with sharp edges and minimal shading, on transparent background. The face is solid black with no features. The body is in a front-facing centered transformative striding pose with scythe-like geometric tool, chibi proportions with large fractal prismatic flame head with unique Merkaba structure suggesting stillness and motion through sharp, layered cut-outs with drawn depth, embodying Sacred. Hair or geometric appendages incorporating Merkaba, Flower of Life, Tetractys patterns, styled with Seraph influences. Outfit is unique: neutral grey inspired by crimson and neutral grey inspired by fire angular armor-like robes with flame geometric patterns fused with Wave-particle duality garments and entanglement-linked robes with flat with sharpie-style lines for heat and energy, incorporating probabilistic patterns on cotton, elaborate with shifting Fire element triangular motifs and ascending patterns and Merkaba emblem on chest; texture flat with sharpie-style lines for depth. Include subtle accessory like sword of severity with angular geometric blade combined with particle accelerator ring with Sacred spiraling energy emanations. Environmental effect: sacred geometric field creating geometric aura patterns around the character with subtle magical essence emanations like flickering flame wisps and ember particles. Emulate construction paper layering style exactly, but make this visually unique based on Governor OPMACAS's profile: 'He who is from the beginning', Aethyr DEO, Fire element, Tarot Death, Sephirot Geburah, Zodiac Scorpio, embodying the essence: 'In OPMACAS's presence, form emerges from formlessness a primordial fire breathing shape into the void.' Resolution 512x512, optimized for layering in Enochian Cyphers game and WebGL rendering with TAP hypertoken metadata embedding.

visual_elements.pose: front-facing centered transformative striding pose with scythe-like geometric tool
visual_elements.head_shape: large fractal prismatic flame head with unique Merkaba structure
visual_elements.body_style: angular geometric body with fractal facets, flattened with sharpie-like crease lines
visual_elements.motion_quality: suggesting stillness and motion through sharp, layered cut-outs with drawn depth, embodying Sacred
visual_elements.hair_style: geometric appendages incorporating Merkaba, Flower of Life, Tetractys patterns, styled with Seraph influences

outfit.base: angular armor-like robes with flame geometric patterns fused with Wave-particle duality garments and entanglement-linked robes
outfit.texture: flat with sharpie-style lines for heat and energy, incorporating probabilistic patterns on cotton
outfit.details: Fire element triangular motifs and ascending patterns
outfit.magical_essence: flickering flame wisps and ember particles

visual_elements.accessory: sword of severity with angular geometric blade combined with particle accelerator ring
visual_elements.environment_effect: sacred geometric field with faint aura lines

profile_data.title: 'He who is from the beginning'
profile_data.essence: In OPMACAS's presence, form emerges from formlessness a primordial fire breathing shape into the void.
profile_data.angelic_role: Seraph of Primordial Flame; governs fire-forged guardians.
profile_data.form_description: A fractal-like prismatic entity emerging from pure flame, constructed of interlocking geometric fire-crystals that pulse with transformative energy, representing the liminal space between potential and manifestation
profile_data.color_reasoning: Obsidian represents Scorpionic depth and transformation, crimson embodies Geburah's martial fire, gold signifies divine spark and alchemical transmutation
profile_data.geometry_reasoning: Sacred geometries representing divine structure, cosmic consciousness, and hierarchical emergence
